title: Strengthening Medical Practical Competencies: Context-Based Dynamic Language Learning Process

context.prior_knowledge: Basic language communication skills and job-related fundamental vocabulary
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can complete formal documents of three or more sentences by utilizing appropriate vocabulary and sentence structures in business email writing scenarios.
Learners can use ten or more work-related expressions contextually in a virtual meeting simulation.
Learners can resolve five or more problem situations that may occur in professional environments through context-specific language tasks.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
